Name: Hostil
About the game: Hostil is a short emotional interactive tale about a young astronaut who has crashed on a extremely dangerous planet. No one will come to rescue him and his only hope is to move forward. 40 minutes of gameplay. 12 captivating hand-drawn scenes. 250 paragraphs of mysterious story. Narrative, visual and musical puzzles. An immersive sound environment. Original soundtrack. Suitable for all ages. 12 secrets and achievements. * By buying the game at its full price you are greatly supporting the developer. Thank you.
